DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study specifically design exercise intervention develop breast cancer patient aromatase-inhibitor related joint pain .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Intervention Breast Cancer Patients With Treatment-Induced Arthralgia
DOC.criteria: Post menopausal woman history estrogen positive breast cancer receive aromatase inhibitor least one month . Patients must complain mild moderate arthralgia . Ability understand sign inform consent . Patients meet criterion low moderate risk moderate exercise base oon ACSM guideline . Inability comply study requirement . Metastatic breast cancer . Patients orthopedic neuromuscular disorder preclude participation exercise . Rheumatoid arthritis . History MI , angina congestive heart failure . Pregnant lactating female . Patients high risk moderate exercise base ACSM risk classification . Patients exceed minimal physical activity recommendation US Surgeon General 's Report : Accumulation 30 minute moderate physical activity day week . Morbidly obese BMI â‰¥ 40
